column4: Panasonic profit weighed by Tesla costs  but in talks for further investment
column5: TOKYO Japan's Panasonic Corp on Wednesday reported a decline in quarterly profit far beyond what analysts estimated  as costs rose at the battery plant it jointly runs with U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc.

column4: UPDATE 2-Panasonic profit weighed by Tesla costs  but in talks for further investment
column5: * Panasonic chief says Tesla unaffected by Musk behaviour (Adds CEO comments  context)

column4: Tire maker Nokian profit hit by Russia  Norway issues  emissions rules
column5: HELSINKI Finland's Nokian Tires  reported a surprise fall in quarterly earnings on Wednesday and cut its full-year profit outlook  citing issues in Russia and Norway on top of new emissions standards that have had an impact across the sector.

column4: UPDATE 3-Tyre maker Nokian profit hit by Russia  Norway issues  emissions rules
column5: * Electric car boom hits sales in Norway (Updates with CEO comments on Norway)

column4: Panasonic Q2 profit falls 15 pct  misses estimates
column5: TOKYO  Oct 31 Japan's Panasonic Corp on Wednesday reported a 15 percent fall in second-quarter operating profit  missing analyst estimates  weighed down by investment in Tesla Inc's battery plant in Nevada.
